      • draw

        public void draw(@NonNull
                 Graphics2D gc,
                 @NonNull
                 ImageCache imageCache,
                 int columnIndex,
                 int rowIndex)
        Draws the tile onto the specified context.
        Parameters:
        gc - The graphics context to draw with.
        imageCache - The image cache to retrieve tile images from.
        columnIndex - The x-axis (column) coordinate where the tile is to be drawn.
        rowIndex - The y-axis (row) coordinate where the tile is to be drawn.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the gc or image cache are null.
